coreAttributes.name: Sausages
coreAttributes.description: A plate of high quality sausages accompanied by seasoned tomatoes and cucumbers all underneath a glass cover. The label on the cover depicts a nude ferret-girl straddling a similar, but comically over-sized sausage, coquettishly hiding her nipples from the viewer.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the glass cover and [npc.verb(breathe)] in the smoky scent of the sausage mixed with a sharp undertone of seasoning. Unable to resist the delicious looking meal, [npc.she] eagerly [npc.verb(start)] wolfing it all down and [npc.verb(empty)] the plate in moments.
